website_summaries.verdict: Windows 10 delivers a refined, vastly improved vision for the future of computing with an operating system that's equally at home on tablets and traditional PCs -- and it's a free upgrade for most users.
pros: Windows 10 bridges the gap between PCs and tablets without alienating anyone
The new OS combines the best bits of old and new Windows features into a cohesive package, while correcting nearly all of the missteps of Windows 8
The upgrade process is mostly painless, and free for most Windows 7 and 8 users
cons: Many of the new features will be lost on those who don't care about touch
Automatic, forced updates could spell trouble later on
Cortana's features are better suited for smartphones

customer_reviews.title: Windows would not Activate...
customer_reviews.text: Right now reccomend you do not buy. Windows would not activate with the code supplied with the disk.
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Received a counterfeit. It installed Home version and would not register provided key.
customer_reviews.text: After looking at some of the peoples reviews and seeing their photos, I can definitely see that mine was a counterfeit cd. No Microsoft holograms anywhere on the CD or packaging. RMA for another CD. I hope my next one is the genuine deal. Updated: 2017-05-11 0 for 2... Received another DVD after RMA, it too will only allow me to install Windows 10 home. The key will not accept. I did a fresh install on another system to verify it wasn't this one particular laptop, it is NOT Windows Professional but Windows 10 Home. CD Key will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase! But it will not register......
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and 10 is a fine product. Update Downgraded to one star. Update: Software will not activate as of 03/16 : Product server key has exceeded its unlock limit. Waiting on a response. Update returned for refund. I would have accepted a replacement but it was not offered, which makes me think. Do they know that they are selling a defective product?
customer_reviews.author: Gator Spotter

customer_reviews.title: Blocked Product Key
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, I was told the Product Key was not valid and had been blocked. They insisted I return it to Amazon after three chat sessions with "support" and one phone call. Hours of time I will never get back.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: you might get a lemon license key like i did
customer_reviews.text: pity i cant review without giving a star but buyers beware. you might get a lemon license key like i did...... was forced to send it back for refund as the license key didnt work....
customer_reviews.author: S. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Fails to activate on brand new PC build
customer_reviews.text: Maximum number of activation limit reached already according to Microsoft rep. On phone with them over 1 hour during which time they did a remote session and verified this product key has already been used. Maybe these are used copies. Don’t know but I’ll just buy direct from Microsoft to save time. The amount saved by purchasing Cheaper OEM is lost in time wasted on the phone with Microsoft. 2 calls and over 90 min total. Don’t waste your time folks
customer_reviews.author: Maui cruiser

customer_reviews.title: If you don't HAVE to have it, DO NOT get it.
customer_reviews.text: I despise Windows 10, it is buggy, forced updates often cause issues and break things that worked before, you can't shut off the spyware, it will eat up your data limits if you are using an isp that limits your data useage, installs things you don't want on it's own, shows ads, and removes user control. They have broken every rule for what an operating system should be, and have no plans to change this. Is it finally time to go full linux?
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong language and already used
customer_reviews.text: When trying to activate, it said the key had already been activated. I was able to call to get it activated, but why risk it? Someone else already has the key, they could just activate theirs again and invalidate yours. Additionally, this was the British English version of Windows 10. While I was able to download the American English language pack, there are still lots of configurations and settings that are not the same (i.e. 24 hour clock at the login screen). Going through the OS to change all these settings to match the defaults found in an American English isn't worth the effort. I returned this and just bought a key direct from Microsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Michael House

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst software to come out of Microsoft in recent years. The OS does not support Microsoft's Media Player software to play videos / movies. Seriously? Plus it is trying to be an iPad / tablet OS running on a PC and just simply misses by miles. I reformatted the hard drive and installed Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit; far superior OS and all the Microsoft software actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works. These are for custom computer builders or if you want to upgrade your current Windows 10 Home license to Professinal license on a Dell, HP, Samsung, Asus, etc. computer. This is for 1 computer only. If computer breaks down and is retired then this product key can be tranferred to a new computer you build or buy. If your computer has a Windows 7 license product key then you do not need this. Your Windows 7 key or Windows 8 key can be used to upgrade to Windows 10. You can download the Microsoft Media Creation tool for creating a Windows 10 disk or flash drive if you have a Win. 7, 8, or 10 product key already.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this as the one I received was a UK version locked down with OEM system builder requirements. While you can install it, you can't install or update anything unless it's been unlocked via an OEM toolkit, which isn't available to builders anymore. I couldn't figure out why my Nvidia drivers kept telling me they weren't supported by the OS when it was Windows 10 Pro. Turns out Microsoft doesn't want individual builders anymore and only release the toolkit to install it to registered OEM companies. Needless to say, this was money down the drain as I had to buy another one from Microsoft that wasn't locked down.
customer_reviews.author: Chip B.

customer_reviews.title: package open and key copied
customer_reviews.text: package was opened so most likely the Windows key will have all ready been used.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pumphrey

customer_reviews.title: Talking to Microsoft was absolutely useless but Amazon fulfilled a refund 5 months after I ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few months then started getting notifications that I needed to activate windows, after attempting to activate windows with my product key I'm told my key is invalid. Talking to Microsoft was absolutely useless but Amazon fulfilled a refund 5 months after I bought this product. After doing more research I noticed some security measures were missing and I actually had a fake disc AND fake coa sticker. Save yourself some hassle and don't buy from mediadeal.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia W.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed to install fine. It somehow crashes every two weeks and will not boot to a Windows login screen. I have set system restore points, but still no luck in fixing it. Both times I ended up wiping app data and keeping personal files. Both times the software to fix Windows 10 said that Windows Defender was corrupt. I have since moved to Ubuntu.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Product Key already used
customer_reviews.text: I installed this and it seemed to activate without a problem. A few days later, now it says it's not activated because the product key was already used on another device. I had to scratch of the key which looked like it hadn't been tampered with, but it looks like I got ripped off anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Product key did not work. Looks like I should have found someone that didn't have a bogus key.
customer_reviews.author: Tokyobound

customer_reviews.title: ... when to MS asked about key said it was good. But having all kinds of trouble
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked OK even when to MS asked about key said it was good. But having all kinds of trouble...can't disable the navigator keyboard and mouse have a mind of there own even thou I disabled everything in Say I am playing an MMO I will hit a key and the game will drop open file explore or the magnifier things like that. I disabled everything in keyboard setting. SO I thinking this not so good I think I got burned. And I did it says nothing of being UK and that is why I am having issues with it. Want my money BACK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Didnt support my video card but there is a workaround
customer_reviews.text: Fresh install on a 4 year old PC. First installed the software but no driver for my video card was available under Windows 10. Video worked OK but the resolution wasnt right. There is a driver available for Windows 8, however I couldnt get it to install. So I downloaded the Win10 software directly from Microsoft, burned the iso to a DVD and reinstalled. This time I could install the Windows 8 video drivers and it worked. The COA sticker is included. Mine was authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new License Key to remedy an activation problem with my 64-bit version of Microsoft Windows 10 Professional. After contacting the Seller and receiving an almost immediate response, indicating the Key is genuine, would work, and would not expire, I purchased it. It worked as hoped and may be the best investment I make this entire year. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Judgemhc

customer_reviews.title: Legit Windows 10 Pro
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to redeem the key yet, but I wanted to at least say that the product I got appears to be 100% legit. It appears to have been packaged by Microsoft and has a product key that was hidden by silver scratch-off material. Using my fingernail, the material came off and the key was totally unscathed. It is intended for use on a new system build that doesn't have a Windows Home product key embedded in the BIOS, as many new brand-name PC's have. If the key under the scratch-off on an envelope labeled by Microsoft doesn't work, I'll be surprised. UPDATE: Just activated Windows 10 Pro today, and it went without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: New User

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this software unless you have new hardware to use with this software
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 is crap crashes all the time interface looks to busy looks like you need a PHD just to figure out how to navigate it sorry Microsoft I usually love your products but your operating systems from windows 8to10 are trash if you keep making windows like this chrome will steel more than market share they will steel customers as well
customer_reviews.author: Roland O.

customer_reviews.title: ITS FAKE When I installed this version of Win 10 from the disk it had a odd install like I was in the UK
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS VERSION!!!!!!!!!!!! ITS FAKE When I installed this version of Win 10 from the disk it had a odd install like I was in the UK, Im in the US. If finally loaded and was running but Windows told me that I needed to authenticate my product. I clicked on the link and it told me that the CD key was blocked. After some research I found out that is a fake copy of Win 10 pro. I had to pay $199.00 to get a valid copy from Microsoft directly.
customer_reviews.author: MadMullet

customer_reviews.title: This seller is a fraud!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a UK version of Windows 10 that makes is super difficult to install. Then when you try to activate it is says the key is invalid. Beware this seller is a fraud. I want my money back or else. I called MS and they were able to convert the scumbag key that this guy is selling. All is well now except for the UK keyboard issue. You Daniel can go to H.
customer_reviews.author: Agnar150

customer_reviews.title: Utterly garbage if you are planning to run Ubuntu or anything unix together with this
customer_reviews.text: The list of known issues, stuff as simple as not being able to tail a log on Unix on a folder mounted from Windows, the lack of performance (it is that slow), a set of tests that on an inferior machine takes minutes has double or tripled on an i9 9900K. Save yourself the trouble and either go with Ubuntu directly or get a Mac with Mac OSX; if your work depends on this. And yes, I believe there is a million ways to eventually get some stuff to work; but everything, at every corner, is a hack; just to move the cart two feet further.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: License KEY worked, but DVD didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Got the "media driver is missing" error when in the first step of installation. Was resolved by download windows 10 installation tool using another computer and loaded it in USB thumb drive. I don't think my DVD room has any problems reading the media, because it was tested to be working and reading other DVD medias as expected. If the DVD you send us is out of date or doesn't work, why don't just cell is he license key to us save us a couple days eating for it?
customer_reviews.author: Zhuo Li

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: When Microsoft promoted the free Windows 10 Upgrade, I was one of millions Windows users that upgraded from Windows 7 to Windows 10 for free. Months into the upgrade I experienced performance problems and s few crashes - my coworkers (Microsoft certified users) experienced the same situation. Therefore, before switching over to Apple, I decided to purchase an official Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit system DVD. I also have reveal in this prose I am a proud owner of a Mac Mini, no negative things to say here. It is good to have an original Windows 10 running in my workstation. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: CubanoLibre

customer_reviews.title: The best OS I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: The first computer I purchased in 1993 was running Windows 3.1. The other day I was watching some old episodes of the "Computer Chronicles" on YouTube and had forgotten what it used to be like to use a computer. So much improvement. I remember the OS's that were terrible- 95, ME, and Vista (Vista was a mess until SP-1 was released), but between all of the crap releases there were the good ones- 98, XP, and 7. I do wish Microsoft would have kept MCE in the OS, but there are alternatives that work out well (Kodi, Plex, and Emby). And, as far as I am concerned- the only version you should buy is the Pro version.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K. Reidy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Panic, you did not buy counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: NOT FAKE! It is however very confusing to activate. Once you get to the activate part, and it fails (it will). You must click on call Microsoft. If you use your smart phone, they walk you through a few time consuming steps, ask if you are only installing this on one computer, then send an activation through your smart phone. Activated fine, and is Windows 10 Pro. As noted by others, this is an OEM installation which makes you the manufacturer, and you are responsible for product support, not Microsoft. This is also meant to be installed on a brand new, never before used system as it's very first OS. It is not an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. J.

customer_reviews.title: Utterly Illegal and lost my money.
customer_reviews.text: Complete Scam. Illegal pirated copies are being sold. I'm terribly confused as to why Amazon would allow this. I purchased this copy for a build a couple months ago and just opened it a few days ago. Microsoft tells the me the key is not even a valid key, not to mention the printed COA is not printed in the intaglio raised ink. Too late for a return apparently. I guess I will try to return it anyway, but looks like I'm out the money. Sucks because I just spent about 3K on a brand new system. First time I have been scammed on Amazon, though. I will have to watch out from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Nethawk

customer_reviews.title: Bad Key. Installed successfully but when attempting to activate ...
customer_reviews.text: Bad Key. Installed successfully but when attempting to activate windows the Microsoft activation system warns that the key is previously used. Further research indicated that this key was used in too many unlocks than allowed by Microsoft. Investigating how to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M

customer_reviews.title: Windon't
customer_reviews.text: No doubt the worst UI design Microsoft has created to dat. All the thing you were used to in XP and Windows 7? Forget it. They rewritten and re positioned everything. The only reason I bought this was to upgrade my mother's laptop. I use Ubuntu. On the plus side, wireless printer support is one hundred times better. Good on the developers for that item.
customer_reviews.author: N. C. Weber

customer_reviews.title: It's all good!
customer_reviews.text: After my old hard drives failed, I decided to replace the upgrade version of W10 [ upgraded over W7.] with this clean install of W10 Pro. Now that my system is back to being fully restored, I have noticed a significant improvement in performance and stability. There were no issues with the installation or registration of this software. The OS has a very good set of utilities for setting up most of the hardware. My computer is a 2011 X58 based system, and I was able to install 2 new SSD's and get everything running at peak performance with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Barnhizer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on the Pro version, ... since you'll be forced to run WIN 10 eventually
customer_reviews.text: OK, so I HATE WIndows 10, but this is a Great Deal for Prime members to get the Pro version. I'm not positive about this, but I read that the Microsoft Overlords don't force updates on the Professional version. Most of my PCs have the free upgrade with the Home version which is really, really terrible. They act like a company's IT department, but controlling your personal assets; taking over your computer, regardless of what you're actually doing and even restarting at their whim.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Keys may be fake or already used, fair warning!
customer_reviews.text: Warning to everyone considering buying this item! I've bought hundreds of things on Amazon over the years, and this warrants my first review. I ordered this product and received a counterfeit key. Microsoft confirmed it on a support call. It seems I'm not the first person with this problem.Appreciate Amazon taking the item back.
customer_reviews.author: SpartanB312

customer_reviews.title: Fraud and deception!  Avoid this product at this price!  Pay more, get what you ordered.
customer_reviews.text: This is fraud! I paid for Windows 10 Pro, System Builder. What installed was Windows 10 Home. After a format of the SSD, my install was what I expected. I paid for Pro. The package was labeled Pro. There was not a screen that mentioned Windows 10. Home I trusted Amazon. My trust was violated. When you cut the tape on the box, you accepted the fraud.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 Pro does very well for me. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 Pro does very well for me. I order my copies from Amazon. I have purchased keys from Kinguin.net in the past and I will probably will again it is much cheaper but, the last key I bought I had to call Microsoft to get it activated because the key showed as previously activated....for a $3000 build I'm not taking a chance spent that much might as well spend a little more and get an OEM key from MS that is worry free. I'll save kinguin for the budget builds.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watterson

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item before reading the negative reviews. When I read several, I was worried that the code would not work. After building my new system, I installed the Win 10 Pro x64 version. Not having an optical drive on the new computer, I used an old Win 10 Pro x64 USB thumb drive installer. Everything loaded as expected, and the code worked the first time. Once the new machine connected to the Internet, the OS activated automatically. OS is now fully updated and current. Would definitely buy this again if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Activation Key Issues
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, there is a huge issue with the activation key not going through for new Window's 10 users. *Typing in Start/Taskbar Search > slui 3 and slui 4 did not work for me as 2 of the options to fix the activation key issue. I've bought 2 of these OEM discs and installed them on 2 separate newly built computers. One computer had no problems with the activation key upon installation, but the other one did. I had to spend almost 2 hours with Microsoft support for them to remotely take over my desktop all to give me a new key set to activate my Windows 10 Pro OEM.
customer_reviews.author: Another User

customer_reviews.title: Actual legit and usable software in hours from a trusted vendor with Amazon protection!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this at lunch via the Amazon app. The email with all the information I needed was waiting for me when I got home. All the links and license key was included. I downloaded the .iso and the media creator tool and was off to the races! Actual legit and usable software in hours. Create you own hard media at home if you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Ax8man

customer_reviews.title: The Key Is Under the scartch off
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was fake. But the key is now under the scratch off and be careful. Its also so darn small once you get it scratched off you'll have to put it under a magnified light to read it. Scratch lightly because P's look like F's ETC. Microsoft needs to get their heads out. Amazon should raise hell with Microsoft about this, because even when the key code was not under a scratch off, it was so tiny it had to be magnified. What the hell are they trying to do sell a product you can't use. I understand security, but this is moronic!!
customer_reviews.author: Dale in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Would say zero stars but it comes with Linux now
customer_reviews.text: As an OS it's almost totally useless from a developer standpoint. It's also the ONLY operating system to have a major virus problem. yet we all still use it. WSL is a great addon though so they get 1 star for that
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not sure was unable to use this. It may have been how the computer was licensed
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this three start because I couldn't load this on to my computer so am not sure the code is good or bad. I had a copy of windows 7 and had a Microsoft account. Microsoft went a head and loaded the original software and did the upgrade to pro when I went to download this from their website so I'm not sure the reason it rejected the code was because the computer was already licensed with a copy of windows 10 pro so I'll give this a medium review but may deserve a 5 star review. I'm sure I'll find out down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Windows 7 key provided for windows 10...that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Confirmed with Microsoft Support the key provided was for Windows 7, not 10 pro, which is what the Sticker, the packaging and the CD show. had to get a new key from windows and install from a downloaded ISO USB.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Eckardt

customer_reviews.title: Warning: counterfiet media
customer_reviews.text: Disc is counterfeit. Could not tell untill I opened the sleeve to look at disc. No holograms on disc, just a hologram STICKER on central hub. Called up Microsoft to see if key was valid. They said it checked out. Did not and will not install from counterfeit media. Downloaded bootable USB drive image from MS and installed from that.
customer_reviews.author: dreifach

customer_reviews.title: Apple is looking better and better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade a 1 week old Laptop from home to professional. I replaced the hard drive with a blank one. When I installed it reverted back to the home version. When I entered the activation key it generated an error. I spent an hour on the phone with MS to fix the issue. They said it was the DVD even though the DVD is authentic and says 'Pro'. I believe it is because the Laptop was somehow registered with MS as home and the system they use DOES NOT RECOGNIZED I AM UPGRADING. Microsoft, please compensate me for my time! Apple is looking better and better.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Kasper

customer_reviews.title: No Product Key Code
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the windows 10 Pro and received the product,the loading of the product was fine.The major issue / problem that it did not come with the product code key. I returned the product with no issues for a replacement, when i received replacement the product, I opened and looked for the product code key and the same issue -No Product Code key! Amazon stated that they will address this issue and will keep me informed.I really like the performance of Windows 10 Pro vs Windows 10 home version. I recommend this product as long as it come with the Product Key Code.
customer_reviews.author: Jack  Guglielmi

customer_reviews.title: Bad key #2
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I have ordered OEM discs from Amazon before for new system build without any issues. I am on Key #2 from Amazon. Each one comes up with the key has been used on another device. Everything looks legit, but they do not activate. Not sure what is going on. I would be cautious of this for now.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful buying this key
customer_reviews.text: This key is for manufacturer's only. Be careful buying it as the seller will sell this same key to multiple customers and if you need support from microsoft you will be out of luck. They will require you to buy a new key.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION:  Removing Security patch can destroy the product key
customer_reviews.text: The software is fine. I actually like Windows 10. However, when I tried to scratch off the silver security patch covering the Product Key it just smeared and ended up destroying a portion of the product key, preventing me from activating the OS. Checking answers.microsoft.com, I found a thread where many folks have encountered the same issue. Amazon graciously accepted my return and is sending a replacement install package.
customer_reviews.author: G. Skala

customer_reviews.title: OEM, not retail copy, cheaper, 1 time use, not retail version, windows 10,
customer_reviews.text: This an OEM version not the retail version. The difference is that OEM is linked to the motherboard of a single computer to used only with that computer. Advantage its much cheaper, perfect for brand new DIY computer build. Disadvantages, you can't take it from build to build or to you next computer situation. (unless you take the motherboard into next build) Plus with retail version you get support from Microsoft. They do promotions but this version is somewhere around $100 the retail can be as much as $220. Since i was building a brand new computer with new motherboard I saved a little money and bought the OEM version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two labels on product confusing
customer_reviews.text: Cardboard description states Windows 10 Home edition, small sticky label says Windows 10 Pro. Gad to return as could not risk opening in case wrong verison and they may refuse to accept return. Poor labeling, needs fixing to save wasting peoples time. Can't risk asking for replacement as they are probably labeled like this!!!
customer_reviews.author: KCxx2

customer_reviews.title: It wouldn't be bad if there was a way to turn it off ...
customer_reviews.text: Forced automatic updates are the most intrusive, anti-work, anti-efficient, anti-american thing ever to enter the PC realm. It wouldn't be bad if there was a way to turn it off (you would think in Win10 Professional you could but NOPE) I can be gaming, playing music, watching a video.... and then all of a sudden - bandwidth maxed out! because Windows 10 decides it needs to download some useless update. Sometimes it even restarts without asking in the middle of me doing something... I'd sooner use Windows 3.1 or Windows 95 than this garbage. Wiping drive and installing Windows 7 Professional - still the best PC OS on the market, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and feature poor.
customer_reviews.text: Same price as full retail version (on Amazon) but with no support. My fault for not noticing "OEM" but it is a bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Windows 7 may be better.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about windows 10 except a lot of things are better but still need to work out certain problems. Just hope it doesn't take a another year for them to figure it out again. Something runs in the background from startup causing your desktop programs to run very slow similar to having too many programs running at the same time or not enough memory. this problem came up with anniversary update. Also sticky notes runs too big on desktop when opened and you cant close it without getting logged out of desk top.
customer_reviews.author: tdemp3

customer_reviews.title: It IS Windows, the download worked, but the ...
customer_reviews.text: It IS Windows, the download worked, but the key was invalid. Attaching a photo for the error I received. Amazon gladly allowed me to return the item for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cherryb6mb

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as promised. I just recently built my first pc, was running the stock free windows since early November 2018. Wanted to upgrade but not pay the ridiculous +$100 windows copy. Read a few reviews from this seller and gave it a shot. Seller is very nice and help. Upon purchasing the key it arrived within 20 minutes, got home from work and input the key. Few seconds later windows recognized it as official. Everything is working smoothly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: You're going to have to upgrade soon!
customer_reviews.text: It's Microsoft's latest release of Windows. For Win Xp, 7, 8 versions, there is a definate learning curve. Things won't be where you expect them to be and logging in is necessary if you want services from Microsoft. A few apps require access to the MS cloud like One-Note and Office, but logging at boot up will get you linked up. E-mail, too, if you are an Outlook user. It can get frustrating! MS Support is available, of course, as are a few Non-MS help web sites. You will need to develop different use habits since it doesn't run like Older unsupported versions.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B. Godbey

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade From Windows 7 Only If You Must
customer_reviews.text: Since Windows 7 was coming up on its end of life I was forced to move to Windows 10 to maintain some semblance of security. I would never describe it as an upgrade. I was unable to restore much of my data including 100s of CDs I had ripped into iTunes. Totally inferior to the simplicity and straightforwardness of Windows 7.
customer_reviews.author: Tony No Baloney

customer_reviews.title: Key worked fine, but disc was UK not US version.
customer_reviews.text: Product key included worked and activated successfully, however the DVD itself was not a US disc. It was English UK only. Using the media creation tool from Microsoft to make a bootable USB installer for Win10 worked fine and accepted the key included with this purchase, but if I am buying Windows 10 software from amazon.com and not amazon.co.uk, and it is labeled as "English", I expect it to be a US disc not a UK one. The most important thing was the key being valid, which it was.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kleinwaks

customer_reviews.title: OK but microsoft should have left the better OS for us
customer_reviews.text: It is fast but I truly hate windows 10 but they are dropping support for 7 in a few years so I almost had to go with the 10 on my new PC. Windows 10 won't allow you to pick and choose updates any more so it messes with some of my software and I end up having to reinstall or fix things so they work right. I do wish they would bring back win7.
customer_reviews.author: Diancatzdogz

customer_reviews.title: Good but wish a better Operating System would come along
customer_reviews.text: Need I say more... they are Microsoft. They hold a monopoly on having an operating system that will support most software out there. Linux is good but does not run the software and hardware that I need. Also the automatic updates drive me mad at times. I consider Microsoft a necessary evil and nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Keith P.

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not often disappointed with an Amazon purchase, but don't plan to buy any more software from them. The product looked like it was a genuine Microsoft product (and maybe it was), but there was no license key to activate Windows. This made it useless. Amazon is refunding the purchase, but this was a full priced version, and not one of those which you could reasonably expect to have a problem activating. I have reminded myself and I remind others to be very careful of bootlegged software. If it's too good to be true, it probably isn't.
customer_reviews.author: LabDog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect timing
customer_reviews.text: Time to upgrade one of my desktops to Windows 10. Found this listing and seen it had taken a fairly descent price drop so the bells went off and signaled now would be a good time to purchase a pro version. Will be doing the upgrade this next week.
customer_reviews.author: DaleM

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. The one I got was the Home version instead of Pro.
customer_reviews.text: I like Windows 10 Pro and have it on two machines. I bought this to install on a machine I had built. I installed it without a problem. However, when I went to encrypt some folders the encrypt field was grayed. I did a quick search and found that Windows 10 Pro supports drive encryption but Windows 10 Home does not. I went to Control Panel->System and found I had installed Windows 10 Home. The pouch it came in said Windows 10 Pro, the sleeve the disk was in said Windows 10 Pro, and the disk label said Windows 10 Pro. I have a hard time believing this is an honest mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Activating was a little tricky, but Google-Fu got it done.
customer_reviews.text: It's Windows 10, so turn off the telemetry service. And anything else you know to do to make it less chatty about your activities. Activating was a little tricky. I think I had to change the product code in order to get the supplied key to work. If you're a sysadmin or have set up a KMS server, that should be a cake walk, but for regular mortals that may prove an unsolvable challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Satyr

customer_reviews.title: I don't know about the actual windows 10. Over ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the actual windows 10. Over the years I have loaded many products you had to have a key for. I had to order windows 10 again because it is a scratch off to see the key. One half wouldn't scratch off finally it did taking part of the key making it uses less with out a key. Hopefully the replacement key won't hold up a new build that only needs windows to be up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Don n.

customer_reviews.title: Why did I get charged over $100 for a system that wouldn't work?
customer_reviews.text: Installed and the very next day it started showing on the screen that it was an illegal install and I needed to enter the Key. I entered the key that was on the DVD sleeve and it refused to accept it. It then went on to use up a whole bunch of my metered BW to install a different version of Win10. Why did I have to pay over $100 to get something that wouldn't work without a complete install done on line? VERY UNHAPPY
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Get used to Windows 10. It's rumored Microsoft is going to make us use it. It still has multiple problems.Frequently, when it updates, It loses most of my intranet connections and frequently dumps printers localed on other computers. May be by the time I'm used to Windows 10, it will go the way of Vista, Mellium, Windows 8, and A-DOS.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Bestic

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this particular OEM version and had to spend some time online with MS support to get my computer activated. I'm still not sure if this was a valid product or if I was the lucky recipient of some kind of Microsoft corporate mercy. In the end it all worked out OK, but it wasn't a slam-dunk. If I had it to do over, I'd just buy from a reputable dealer or even Microsoft themselves. For a while there I was really thinking I had been scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Clay

customer_reviews.title: Must have a disk
customer_reviews.text: I found out the hard way, "If you have a boot problem you must have the Win 10 Install disk". I did a free simple un grade from MS, from an older 8.1. No install disk. It crapped out and could not fix without it. Seems a rip.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: How can anyone complain?
customer_reviews.text: As promised, the Key arrived via email in 29 minutes, and took even less time to install. You can use do to a full clean install via the Microsoft official download link, which allows download of the latest DVD install image, or you can do what i did and in-lpace upgrade your windows from 8.1 to 10 Pro. Thank you for a great value, and delivery as quick and easy as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Victor R.

customer_reviews.title: And no i do not like random crap beeing installed disguised as updates WTH is ...
customer_reviews.text: This things just gives me a headache What's with all the junkware that win 10 comes with ??? And no i do not like random crap beeing installed disguised as updates WTH is with that xbox app why can that not be uninstalled and why can't the other crap be uninstalled i don't give 2 flying F$#@% about flipboard and your junk games you try to shove down my throat When i see tiles i see red i hate these F@%$#!@ things If i want ADS i can turn on my samsung tv and watch their crappy ads on the bottom of the screen
customer_reviews.author: Pole Pot

customer_reviews.title: So Many Features and a Smooth Installation
customer_reviews.text: Well I had to update from Vista64 because some of the software and drivers are not longer supported. So I bit the bullet and ordered a new hard drive, a hard drive switch box, and Windows 10. The install went so smoothly that I decided to do my wife's computer also in the same way. So now we both have dual boot systems with a push of a button. Windows 10 is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loaded very well with no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Going from Win 7 PRO to Win 10 PRO is a big change for us. Activation and Updates were done when we checked. We are pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars due to first key not working. Emailed ArvinyaHomeTurkey and got a new one that worked in a matter of minutes. Very good seller with fast responses to problems.
customer_reviews.author: Psycho1

customer_reviews.title: A Quality OS for the Modern Age
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy to use the OS is on a daily basis, but I was not a fan of the set-up. It's easily the best OS I've used as a software developer, and it ain't bad for gaming, either. To get the system running took no effort at all, but to get it working well (disable Cortana) shouldn't have taken any time at all. I also find that the customization features, while welcome and numerous, are a bit disorganized and sprawling. I've been trying to get my home PC and work PC to look the same for months and I still can't find the right options.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gergar

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy but I work in IT
customer_reviews.text: It is Windows 10 Pro but an earlier edition that requires updating right out of the package. I had to manually install the WIFI network connection drivers to connect the laptop to the internet so make sure you know what brand and type it is before installing. Once online I did a Windows update and many of the missing drivers for other hardware were installed but not all. I still had to download about three other drivers that where not recognized by Windows 10. I'm happy but I work in IT, a novice might struggle with an installation.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gary

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 for less than $40.00
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 is an excellent product. I was fortunate enough to purchase a copy for less than $40.00 from a third party on Amazon's website. I was going to purchase additional licenses but the site is no longer available through Amazon. It was probably too simple and cheap but it works great. hope the site is allowed back as I finally purchased a copy of Windows 10 that was priced more realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Install, but won't activate.
customer_reviews.text: This is an UK version from the start, which may not be a big deal. The product key does work, so the installation went through. However, it failed to activate with Microsoft. You will not be able to customize the windows, and even some basic command utility (like run the command prompt as admin) doesn't work. Regret to buy this one, and have to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Raf

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend just downloading the windows 10 USB installer (which I ...
customer_reviews.text: Disk was corrupted and took hours to get this installed. I would recommend just downloading the windows 10 USB installer (which I ended up having to do) and then buying a key from g2a or another key reseller site or Microsoft directly.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Eh it's ok....
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 is good for the user that doesn't mind the operating system taking over and managing it's own updates, etc. I prefer to manage everything on my computer so I find that aspect annoying. Also, some accessories software/drivers don't work such as printer software and win 10 defaults are limited. I only went with this as it is the most recent os out there but I think last decent OS was windows 7.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D

customer_reviews.title: Amazon may need to investigate this software and possibly remove it from sale.
customer_reviews.text: Something strange about this software - no product key number could be found anywhere and multiple versions of current Win 10 Pro 64-bit nVidia drivers refused to install, showing an error message that software version was incompatible. Reinstalling Win 10 Pro 64-bit from a different purchase worked fine and the same nVidia drivers installed without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Kashi

customer_reviews.title: Phony key for Windows 10 Pro
customer_reviews.text: My installation of Windows suddenly deactivated and wouldn't re-activate. I contacted Microsoft support and they said that the key isn't a valid key and never should have worked. This seller sold me a fake key.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: It Is An Operating System
customer_reviews.text: This is an intensely intrusive Operating System; that reminds me of "free" software except I paid dearly for it. Something this expensive should not be so nosy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Figlik

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: I received a valid product code and was able to activate Windows with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very unsatisfactory purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor transaction... this was garbage. The disc would only let you install with language 'English-Great Britain'. The install could not find ANY of the drivers for my new system, using an i8700K processor and Asus Maximus X Hero Motherboard. The tiny Product Key is under a scratch-off sticker, and is very easy to damage. When I entered the key, it told me the key was in use by another system. A complete waste of time and money. I'm very dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rolik

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fakes
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 Pro has been fine... but so far 2 of the 4 I've ordered here we're fake / bad codes. They all looked legit, and the recommendations I've seen from others didn't always apply. As such, I would order as you need them, and try to keep track of which ones came from which third party vendor. Update: ordered more, still at about %50 success rate
customer_reviews.author: Fra

customer_reviews.title: Installed from the disk. Installation is very smooth. ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed from the disk. Installation is very smooth. Up and running without a problem. The only trouble I have is the product key. The key is attached on a tiny area on package, and it's very hard to find. I used a amplifying glass to search the package and found the key.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 problems to Toshiba Satellite Pro
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 had to be reinstalled after a total crash caused by iPhone incompatibility to iCloud. Ever since installation, some of my shortcut keys on my laptop do not work (Sound on/off; volume pin icon doesn't work to turn up or down; button shortcut to turn sound off or on stopped working; volume buttons do work but make a lot of dinging noise since the screen won't work to turn volume up or down.
customer_reviews.author: DRCaine

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in the evening and the next day I got the code (bought on a holiday, maybe that's why there was a delay). Code came with a few helpful links on how to format USB and create ISO File. Installed and works just fine. I will update if for some reason it stops working in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The version of Windows 10 I got was a British distribution luckily I read the prompts and made sure I set the English dialect and keyboard to U.S. There are other difference to the install, such as Cortana is permanently switch to the off position, and if you try to turn it on, a dialogue box opens explaining that this is not allowed due to the region. I was expecting a U.S. version, but I am working through the issues brought on by this not being a U.S. version.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Buy the OEM DVD disk for a brand new build with empty SSD
customer_reviews.text: Came up and worked great, very quick and easy and arrived quickly after order. A bit confusing to know what to purchase for a full, at home, personal build of a ATX Asus motherboard and empty SSD. Of course I also had to have a DVD drive as part of the build to read the disk ... but it only costs $20.
customer_reviews.author: Ozslotguy

customer_reviews.title: Key worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The key worked perfectly. I didn't even end up using the disk that came with it. I am not sure why there are so many review that claim that the software key does not work well. Perhaps there is a small chance that this could happen but hopefully they would give you your money back. I used this key to install Windows 10 on my MacBook Pro 2017 using Apple's Bootcamp tool. It didn't take too long and was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Kierum

customer_reviews.title: The provided OEM key did not activate, Microsoft support ...
customer_reviews.text: The provided OEM key did not activate, Microsoft support representative said my key is BLOCKED. This generally means the product has been activated multiple times before or has never been valid in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Stanislaw S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Win10 disc with a valid product key
customer_reviews.text: Loaded a USB drive from the Microsoft website and loaded a fresh copy of windows. The product key that came with the disc worked, so my needs were met.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal Overton

customer_reviews.title: Installed without a hiccup.
customer_reviews.text: After assembling my computer, I slip the disk into the CD/DVD and followed the instructions. Several minutes later my computer was up and running. That is all there was to it. Note: Carefully rub off the silver film that is covering the Key Code. I gently used my nail to remove cover.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Product key no good.
customer_reviews.text: I'm fine with Windows 10 Pro. My issue was the bad product key. The first sign of trouble was the Locale after the clean install. It was UK, not US. The product key would not activate at all. Amazon took it back without issue. The seller was 'ProntO'. I'll be reaching out to them as well for an explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Real deal product
customer_reviews.text: The key came in really quickly as an email and the code worked. This is not a scam and they are reliable
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Washington

customer_reviews.title: Knock off - the program comes without any registration code ...
customer_reviews.text: Knock off - the program comes without any registration code; it cannot be activated. Had to be returned, or thrown out - Microsoft actually provided a legit version after what I went through with this seller - I was told by MS, that without an activation code this is NOT MS OEM operating system. Beware
customer_reviews.author: MLESQ

customer_reviews.title: windows 10 pro disc
customer_reviews.text: I just tried to use this disc for the first time and it don't work , will not boot or read on any dvd drive I have a new computer and the drive works fine, it will not read the disk . Windows 10
customer_reviews.author: James W Serad

product_meta.title: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit System Builder OEM
product_meta.description: Windows Pro 10 64Bit English 1pack DSP DVD. Windows 10 is so familiar and easy to use, you'll feel like an expert. The Start Menu is back in an expanded form, plus we'll bring over your pinned apps and favorites so they're ready and waiting for you. It starts up and resumes fast, has more built-in security to help keep you safe, and is designed to work with software and hardware you already have. Windows 10 comes with Microsoft Edge, an all-new browser that's built to give you a better web experience. Write2 or type notes directly on webpages and share them with others, read online articles free of distraction, and save your favorite reads for later access. And with Cortana3 enabled, you get instant access to key actions-like making reservations or reading reviews-without leaving the page you're on. Easily snap up to four apps in place and see all open tasks in a single view. You can even create virtual desktops when you need more space or want to group things by project. Windows 10 enables your apps to look and work great in all modes, on all devices. On 2-in-1 devices, your screen can be optimized to work with touch or keyboard and mouse. Required Processor1 GHz processor or faster, Required Memory 1 GB RAM for 32-bit; 2 GB for 64-bit, Required Hard Disk Space Up to 20 GB available hard disk space, Required video card 800 x 600 screen resolution or higher. DirectX 9 graphics processor with WDDM driver, Required connectivity Internet access (fees may apply), Other system requirements Microsoft account required for some features. Watching DVDs requires separate playback software.
feature_bullets: Note:OEM and OEI are the same thing The Start menu is back and better than ever so you can expand and customize it Key Included
Join your business or school domain for easy access to network files, servers, and printers
Login with Remote Desktop and create virtual machines with Hyper-V;BitLocker & Enhanced encryption

Windows 10 OEM is a full version of the operating system not an upgrade The OEM operating system is not supported by Microsoft To acquire Windows software with support provided by Microsoft please see our full package "Retail" product Microsoft recommends all files and programs be backed-up prior to installation

Windows 10 OEM is intended for pre-installation on a new PC and cannot be transferred to another computer once installed NOTE: Installation is only possible when using a clean (blank) machine with no other prior version of Windows already installed Product ships in a white envelope Product Key is below scratch off Microsoft label

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
